faq.question: How do i receive my order?
faq.answer: After finalizing your purchase, be sure to check your friend invitations to send items. It is required that our bots be on your friends list for at least 24 hours. Once you have successfully completed the task and delivered the goods, the bots will be automatically deleted.

faq.question: After purchase, when will i receive my order?
faq.answer: League of Legends - In order to successfully deliver the order, we must meet certain requirements set by the customer. Once your friend invitations are accepted, you will receive your gifts exactly 24 hours later. It is worth remembering that there is a limit of 10 gifts per account in 24 hours. If you have already received the maximum number of gifts, another 10 will be available after another 24 hours. *For fortnite, the time is extended to 48h

faq.question: What forms of payment are accepted?
Can I return a purchased product?
faq.answer: Normally, digital products are not subject to returns due to the nature of the product. However, if you have problems with your purchased product, please contact our customer service department.

faq.question: Is this safe?
faq.answer: Without a doubt, we have managed to fulfill thousands of orders without any problems. Our priority is to ensure the satisfaction of every customer, so we make every effort to ensure that no one leaves us unsatisfied.
